[i]Akelo searched far and wide and did not find a weapon to his needs, so he forged his own blade fit to slay a myth.[/i]
Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, equip abilities you activate cost {3} less.
Equipped creatures you control gain vigilance and double strike until end of turn.
